      • getTerm

        public Term getTerm()
             throws OtherException,
                    SyntaxException,
                    TypeException
        This function tries to find the value of the referenced Question.
        Overrides:
        getTerm in class Term
        Returns:
        the value of the referenced Question.
        Throws:
        OtherException - if the Question isn't answered yet (caught by the Question or Condition)
        SyntaxException - if the Variable references a Question that doesn't exist.
        TypeException - when Types don't match.
